title: 1.14.4安装optifine至游戏目录时报错
author: Charoner_
txt_content:
报错如下

————————————————————————————————————————————

java.lang.NullPointerException

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
optifine 直接放入 mods 文件夹即可

或者使用整合包 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=869469
